name: Mergers and Acquisitions
description: This course deals with issues related to mergers and acquisitions. The main focus is to develop a solid understanding of the valuation of potential acquisition targets from a bidders perspective. Other themes to be explored include M and A and corporate strategy, motivations for M and A, corporate restructuring and divestitures, financing M and A activity, and M and A 'waves' over the past 50 years. [24L]
